description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Stick 'Em Up 2: Paper Adventures is a run'n'gun/platform game of stick figure characters fighting through beautiful paper and card levels using everything from spears to a rocket launcher equipped helicopter. 4 players can play through the campaign together, or go against each other in VS and team VS modes.
description.short: Stick 'Em Up 2: Paper Adventures is a run'n'gun/platform game of stick figure characters fighting through beautiful paper and card levels using everything from spears to a rocket launcher equipped helicopter. 4 players can play through the campaign together, or go against each other in VS and team VS modes.
